mods.abstract: Kenrick Hall stands in the background as students and their dates prepare for the parade before a football game against Central. Cheerleaders Carolyn Ward, Ann Lee, and Marcy Jean Maley rode in the first car; drivers unknown. CBC senior, Bill Aden, drove the second car.
